title: I, the Hopeless Sister, Love My Sister - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Romance   School Life   Yuri
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Incest   Naive Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Popular Love Interests   Secrets   Sister Complex   Twins
author: Myon Myon   みょんみょん
description:
I, Tachibana Mako have a twin sister named Tachibana Koma. She’s different from the hopeless me who can’t do anything, she’s kind, beautiful and brilliant and a little sister who I am proud of. But, there’s one thing that I can’t talk to anybody about my little sister.

This is the beginning of a silly yuri (?) rom-com about an enthusiastic siscon elder sister and her lovable younger sister!>
